definition: to plan a project/to stand on tiptoe/Taiwan pr. [qi4]/abbr. for 企業|企业[qi3 ye4]
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Most entrepreneurs skirt close to it.
sentences.chinese: 大多数企业家会绕道而行。

sentences.english: Their children have been nicknamed the "rich second generation".
sentences.chinese: 企业家的孩子也得了外号“富二代”。

sentences.english: Phornchanok Achalaboon. M. M. in Entrepreneurship Management, Mahidol University, Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 硕士，泰国玛希隆大学，企业家职能管理专业。

sentences.english: Why did you become an entrepreneur?
sentences.chinese: 为什么您会成为一位企业家？

sentences.english: At first sight intrapreneurship looks like an excellent idea.
sentences.chinese: 乍一看，大企业家精神像是个非常棒的概念。

sentences.english: This use of lawyers by business people is called preventive law .
sentences.chinese: 企业家这样使用律师，叫做防范性法律顾问工作。

sentences.english: Private entrepreneur intergenerational succession is one of the livelihood problems.
sentences.chinese: 民营企业家的代际传承是一大民生问题。

sentences.english: We will be team-oriented people with entrepreneurial spirit.
sentences.chinese: 我们将成为具有企业家精神的协作团队。

sentences.english: He said microcredit has shown a way to empower women into entrepreneurship.
sentences.chinese: 他说，微额贷款为妇女成为企业家提供了一条途径。

sentences.english: Do you condone truth-twisting for entrepreneurs?
sentences.chinese: 你能宽恕企业家歪曲事实吗？

sentences.english: Women in these places are far from high-achieving entrepreneurs.
sentences.chinese: 农村妇女和成功的女企业家相差甚远。

sentences.english: Enter that paragon of self-reliance, the entrepreneur.
sentences.chinese: 企业家毫无疑问是自立的典范。

sentences.english: The article is discussed about the concept of enterpriser and the importance of philosophy rational thought.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了企业家的概念及其具有哲学理念的重要性。

sentences.english: The modern enterprisers should be the enterprisers in the form of group and team organisation.
sentences.chinese: 现代企业家应该是团队制度型企业家。

sentences.english: The modern enterprisers should be the enterprisers in the form of group and team organisation.
sentences.chinese: 现代企业家应该是团队制度型企业家。

sentences.english: Do you understand what it takes to be a real entrepreneur?
sentences.chinese: 你明白要成为一个企业家所具备的条件吗？

definition: to begin an undertaking/to start a major task/to initiate/to venture/venture/entrepreneurship
